mapper.select: select basicset_comment_auto_review from blog_blogset where blog_set_id = #{blogSetId}
select basicset_website_onlinetime from blog_blogset where blog_set_id = #{blogSetId}

select blogset_perpage_show_num, blogset_latest_show_num, blogset_scroll_recommended_show_num, blogset_recommended_show_num, blogset_ranking_show_num, blogset_special_recd_show_num, blogset_nav_bar_show_num, blogset_no_pic_use_default, blogset_no_coverpic_use_contentpic, blogset_friend_links, blogset_sidebar_other_message, blogset_remark from blog_blogset where blog_set_id = #{blogSetId}
